channel.title: Removing Thread Per Client Save/Load Problems
channel.description:
Hey guys i successfully removed TPC on my czar base but now it doesnt load character files. I followed this tutorial
http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/removing-thread-per-client-stops-syi-attacks-fully-572309/
But the thing I am asking is when i did the extra tut down the bottom for loading i got conflicts between client/PlayerSave and I couldnt figure out how to fix it. Can someone please help meh out here!

item.title: Removing Thread Per Client Save/Load Problems
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Ninja Stupid Ninja
item.description:
@Stupid_Ninja wrote:

Hey guys i successfully removed TPC on my czar base but now it doesnt load character files. I followed this tutorial

RaGEZONE - MMO development community

Removing thread per client - Stops SYI Attacks fully - RaGEZONE - MMO...

Assumed Knowledge: How to read, adding new classes, editing classes, common sense. Tested Server: Winterlove, so should work on all Winterlove-based servers. Files/Classes Modi

But the thing I am asking is when i did the extra tut down the bottom for loading i got conflicts between client/PlayerSave and I couldnt figure out how to fix it. Can someone please help meh out here!
